page.title: 11Pakistan & New Commonwealth
page.content: From the 1981 census, and with the help of local people, Peterborough Technical College and Coventry Polytechnic the following information has been compiled:- 1981/82 1986/87 Pakistanis 3364 4798 West Indians 1311 1697 East African Asians 2397 3210 Indians 1813 2428 Far East 712 943 _____ _____ 9597 13076 _____ _____ Age Range No. % (1981) 1981 % projected 0 - 4 968 12.89 1685 5 - 15 1992 26.54 3470 16 - 29 1989 26.50 3465 30 - 44 1438 19.16 2505 45 - 60/65 931 12.40 1621 60 - 65+ 187 2.70 353
